metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2509 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability found in gnutls. This security flaw happens because of a double free error occurs during verification of pkcs7 signatures in gnutls_pkcs7_verify function.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per upstream, affects 3.6.0 to 3.7.6, but code in bionic looks similar

criterions.comment: gnutls28: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
